create table public."Pet" (
  "PetID" bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  "ProfileID" uuid not null,
  "PetName" text not null,
  "Species" text null,
  "Breed" text null,
  "Birthdate" date null,
  "Size" text null,
  "Gender" text null,
  "PetDescription" text null,
  "Status" text not null,
  constraint Pet_pkey primary key ("PetID"),
  constraint Pet_PetID_key unique ("PetID"),
  constraint Pet_ProfileID_fkey foreign KEY ("ProfileID") references "Profile" ("ProfileID")
) TABLESPACE pg_default;
